# applicationSupportsShakeToEdit

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether shaking the device displays the undo-redo user interface.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var applicationSupportsShakeToEdit: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. Set the property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if you don’t want your app to display the Undo and Redo buttons when users shake the device.

## Controlling and handling events

- **sendEvent(_:)**: Dispatches an event to the appropriate responder objects in the app.
- **sendAction(_:to:from:for:)**: Sends an action message identified by the selector to a specified target.
